+    private static final int SIZE = RAND.nextInt(128, 1153);
@@ -65,2 +65,2 @@

-        int end = mid + RAND.nextInt(cb.capacity() - mid + 1); // from mid to capacity

+        int end = RAND.nextInt(mid + 3, cb.capacity()); // from mid to capacity
